dcterms:description: A benchmark suite for fine-grained open-vocabulary object detection, providing object bounding boxes and detailed natural language captions that describe the objects and their attributes.
dcterms:title: Fine-Grained Open-Vocabulary Object Detection (FG-OVD)

dcterms:creator: Andrej Karpathy
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing images and their corresponding textual descriptions, used for training and evaluating image-text matching models.
dcterms:title: MS-COCO

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of egocentric video footage, used for various tasks including object detection and understanding in real-world scenarios.
dcterms:title: Epic-Kitchens
